TopicTitle: Helix II, reliable, handy cargo plane

Articles.Content:
Manuverable, Fast, Reliable, this plane can be used as a fuel tanker, crew transporter, or a cargo plane with no problems.

This plane can be modified to carried crew, bombs, cargo, a docking port etc. Since there is a big clearance between the ground and the belly of the plane, it can carry +15 ton Cargo with ease. This plane can withstand getting a wing blown off and land it perfectly fine, it can get both of it's landing gear broken off and land fine with only it's frontal landing gear, it can withstand waterlandings, it can break out of stalls, and it also can lift off (with NO cargo) at 30m/s or about in 40 feet. It's versatile duel engines can carry the plane to 20,000 meters and still speed across the globe at the speed of sound. Also it's unique tail design gives the plane very powerful yaw control. This plane is designed as a small cargo plane to fly at relatively low/medium altitudes. THIS PLANE CAN TAKE A BEATING.

Craft File: http://www./view/cr5mcrp94gbzpc6/Helix%20II.craft
